item.title: Ukraine at 'critical moment' in war as European allies ramp up pressure on Russia
item.description: "We all know that the destiny of this country is the destiny of Europe," German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said.

item.title: Trump threatens Mexico with 5% tariff increase over water dispute
item.description: President Donald Trump on Monday threatened to impose an additional 5% tariff on Mexico if it doesn't immediately provide additional water to help U.S...

item.title: House Democrats establish AI working group as industry bolsters DC presence
item.description: House lawmakers see the commission as a starting point for working with industry on AI policies, issues.

item.title: Former Trump lawyer Alina Habba resigns as New Jersey U.S. attorney after disqualification
item.description: Alina Habba previously served as a defense lawyer for President Donald Trump, before being tapped to become the top federal prosecutor in New Jersey.

item.title: Trump says Netflix, WBD deal could be 'problem' as son-in-law Kushner backs Paramount bid
item.description: Trump's comments came days after Netflix beat out Paramount Skydance's offer for all of WBD, and Comcast's bid for part of the company.
